messages.content: ComfyUI-RunRunRun is an extension for ComfyUI that adds an HTTP API endpoint `http://127.0.0.1:8188/comfyui-run/run`.
What is the purpose of the HTTP API endpoint added by ComfyUI-RunRunRun?
The HTTP API endpoint added by ComfyUI-RunRunRun is intended to be used in other LLM (large language model) projects.
What is the URL of the HTTP API endpoint provided by ComfyUI-RunRunRun?
The URL of the HTTP API endpoint provided by ComfyUI-RunRunRun is `http://127.0.0.1:8188/comfyui-run/run`.
Does ComfyUI-RunRunRun add any other functionality besides the HTTP API endpoint?
Based on the provided information, ComfyUI-RunRunRun only adds the HTTP API endpoint `http://127.0.0.1:8188/comfyui-run/run` for use in other LLM projects.
Is ComfyUI-RunRunRun a standalone application or an extension for ComfyUI?
ComfyUI-RunRunRun is an extension for ComfyUI, not a standalone application.
Can the HTTP API endpoint provided by ComfyUI-RunRunRun be accessed remotely?
The HTTP API endpoint provided by ComfyUI-RunRunRun uses the localhost address `127.0.0.1`, which means it can only be accessed locally on the same machine where ComfyUI is running.
What port does the HTTP API endpoint provided by ComfyUI-RunRunRun use?
The HTTP API endpoint provided by ComfyUI-RunRunRun uses port 8188.
